fulltext: oai:lindat.mff.cuni.cz:11234/1-1452;2018-07-02T22:05:53Z;hdl_11858_00-097C-0000-0001-486F-D;hdl_11858_00-097C-0000-0001-4877-A;KonText Web Demo;Josífko, Michal;web service;corpus;parallel corpus;demo;An interactive web demo for querying selected ÚFAL and LINDAT corpora. LINDAT/CLARIN KonText is a fork of ÚČNK KonText (https://github.com/czcorpus/kontext, maintained by Tomáš Machálek) that contains some modifications and additional features. Kontext, in turn, is a fork of the Bonito 2.68 python web interface to the corpus management tool Manatee (http://nlp.fi.muni.cz/trac/noske, created by Pavel Rychlý).;2014;toolService;http://hdl.handle.net/11234/1-1452;ces;eng;GNU General Public License, version 2;http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html;PUB;application/x-gzip;text/plain; charset=utf-8;downloadable_files_count: 1;Charles University, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics (UFAL);https://github.com/czcorpus/kontext

notes: An interactive web demo for querying selected ÚFAL and LINDAT corpora. LINDAT/CLARIN KonText is a fork of ÚČNK KonText (https://github.com/czcorpus/kontext, maintained by Tomáš Machálek) that contains some modifications and additional features. Kontext, in turn, is a fork of the Bonito 2.68 python web interface to the corpus management tool Manatee (http://nlp.fi.muni.cz/trac/noske, created by Pavel Rychlý).
title: KonText Web Demo
